title: ATENTION DEVELOPERS- Vi hero First abilty ( Q ) bug or problem. need help to fix
body:
Hello,
I want to enquire about Vi ( hero ) i have been using and i believe there has been a change that has made her first ability more difficult to use and i am not sure what fault it is.

When i started using Vi last week i was able to smoothly use her first ablity with only like minimum 2 clicks now it takes minimum 4 clicks.

At first i just needed to left click mouse on ability 1 then click again on the floor until the charge goes the furthest i need and release the button i was holding on to for charging at opponent.

Now i have to left click on ability, left click on floor, left click to power charge and left click again to release to charge at opponent.

I am not sure why this is happening. Please send me some solutions. Thanks.{{champion:254}} 


Last of all please dont give me the solution to use smart cast or use Q to cast my ability quicker. I would want the old way back.

replies.body: Im not getting the solution to the problem.

Probably because there isn't a problem and you need to learn to either smart cast, or learn to get over whatever problem you think exists, cause no one else actually gives a shit.

EDIT: I also just tried it in a custom, if you just hit the Q button it auto cast's it even without quick cast, if your clicking the ability buttons there is something wrong with you

why did they have this method of clicking the ability or exist in the first place if there was something wrong with me. 

Why change it now if it worked great before?

I dont get whats wrong with the other method that it has to change.

If you dont give a shit then why post reply this to me? Does it look like i give a shit if you dont like my method?
